headlines.description: Bournemouth and Watford produced a frantic flurry of first half goals, with Troy Deeney scoring twice, in a 3-3 Premier League draw.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth and Watford score six in crazy first half

headlines.description: Chelsea struggled to break down a resolute Southampton as both sides settled for a 0-0 Premier League draw at Stamford Bridge on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea start Morata in goalless draw vs. Saints

headlines.description: Huddersfield Town suffered a club record eighth straight defeat as they fell to a 2-1 home loss to fellow strugglers Burnley.
headlines.shortLinkText: Huddersfield in deep trouble after loss to Burnley

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at West Ham United

headlines.description: Marko Arnautovic scored twice in the space of two minutes as West Ham United salvaged a 2-2 draw with Brighton & Hove Albion.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arnautovic brace rescues West Ham in Brighton draw

headlines.description: Wolves saw their impressive Premier League campaign run into the buffers as two goals in the dying minutes enabled Crystal Palace to take the win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace deepen Wolves' woe with late win

headlines.description: Manchester United's good form under Ole Gunnar Solskjaer continued with a 2-0 win away at Newcastle on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Solskjaer matches Busby with fourth win in four
